price: (Bukan demikian), sebenarnya siapa yang menepati janji (yang dibuat)nya207 dan bertakwa, maka sesungguhnya Allah menyukai orang-orang yang bertakwa.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: 207.  Yakni janji yang telah dibuat seseorang, baik terhadap sesama manusia maupun terhadap Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
